failed_criteria: Major removable object placed on DVR blocking all top vents
action_plan: Remove the removable device from on top of the DVR or relocate it so that the DVR's top vents are fully unobstructed, ensuring proper heat dissipation.
visual_feedback: AverMedia device stacked directly on top of the Hikvision DVR, covering the top vents.

failed_criteria: DVR placement: DVR must be visible in the photo.
action_plan: Retake photo to clearly show the DVR in the submission area, ensuring it is unobstructed and visible.
visual_feedback: No identifiable DVR unit visible; only networking equipment and UPS are shown.

failed_criteria: DVR must be visible in the photo. If the device is completely obstructed or the photo is of the wrong area, fail.
action_plan: Retake and resubmit the photo ensuring the DVR device is clearly visible, unobstructed, and correctly framed in the submission.
visual_feedback: No DVR device detected; the submission shows only networking equipment without the DVR visible.

failed_criteria: DVR must be visible in the photo. If the device is completely obstructed or the photo is of the wrong area, fail.
action_plan: Retake photo showing the DVR clearly in the frame, ensuring it is not obstructed and captures its placement in the security office/DVR area.
visual_feedback: The submission photo appears to show network equipment and patch panels but no identifiable DVR device; the DVR is not visible.

failed_criteria: A major, removable object (UPS) is placed directly on the DVR, fully blocking top vents
DVR vents and heat sinks are not unobstructed
action_plan: Remove the UPS from the top of the DVR to ensure no removable objects block vents
Ensure all DVR vents (top and sides) remain unobstructed by storing removable items elsewhere
visual_feedback: UPS unit sits directly atop the DVR, covering the entire top surface vents
No visible gap around DVR vents; top vents are completely smothered by the UPS

failed_criteria: DVR must be visible in the photo.
action_plan: Retake the photo ensuring the DVR device is fully visible and unobstructed by boxes or other objects.
visual_feedback: The DVR device is fully concealed behind stacked boxes on both sides; no part of the DVR is visible.
